title: Defining the Alternative Hypothesis
text: Alternative hypothesis: the mean of the final exam scores of the online class is less than the mean of the final exam scores of the face-to-face class.

title: Selecting Alternative
text: Which of the following choices is the mean of the final exam scores of the online class, $$μ_1$$, less than the mean of the final exam scores of the face-to-face class, $$μ_2$$?
